page.title: 14Events in the Valley
page.content: At Goodwood Racecourse there are usually fifteen race days per annum. Attendance at the small meetins average five thousand per day,swelling to fifteen thousand for the five day July Meeting. Sponsorship amounts to threehundred and thirty five thousand pounds prize money. There are nine fulltime employees with up to two hundred temporary staff on race days. There are approximately four sponsored walks through thr area each year in aid of charities. Walkers number from one thousand to six thousand using three routes over the Downs. The major walk is organised by the Royal Military Police.
